verses.text: Ha Jehová ko Diosal, yelxo wal niwan yelk'ochi, smoj wal yalchaj wach' lolonel t'ay t'a yol schonhab', aton tzalan b'aj tz'och ejmelal t'ay.

Manhxo jantacoc swach'il yilji jun tzalan tik, chaanh ayk'ei. Ha t'a chon tzalan Sion tik, b'aj kajan Dios, a tik ay wal stzalajk'olal masanil heb' kajan t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik. Ha Sion tik schonhab' Vinh Rey yelxo wal niwan yelk'ochi.
Ha Dios ayek' t'a juntzanh palacio t'a tzalan Sion tik. Ojtakab'il to ha Dios ayoch ko columaloc.
Ix smolb'ej sb'a heb' winh rey, ix cot nhililoc heb' winh yak' owal t'a chonhab' Sion tik.
Palta ayic ix yilan jun chonhab' tik heb' winh, ix sat sk'ool heb' winh. Ix somchajel sk'ool heb' winh, ix b'at heb' winh elelal.
Ix yamchaj heb' winh yuj xiwelal, tz'ib'xi heb' winh yuj yaelal, icha junok ix ix wan yalji yune'.
Icha tz'aj spojb'at te' barco yic chonhab' Tarsis yuj owal ik' scot t'a b'aj sjawi k'u, icha chi' ix aj satel heb' winh yuj Dios.
Ha t'a schonhab' Jehová ko Diosal Yajal t'a Smasanil, ix quil wal yelk'och icha wal alb'ilkan t'ayonh. Ha Dios ol yak'nhej stek'anil Jerusalén.
Ach ko Diosal, ayic ayonhek' t'a a templo, sko nacot a niwan wach'k'olal.
Ach ko Diosal, te b'inajnac ach t'a smasanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik, yuj chi' tz'alchaj wach' lolonel t'ayach. Tza b'o yaj masanil tas t'a stojolal yet' a poder.
Ay stzalajk'olal heb' aj Sion. Te tzalajokab' heb' aj Judá yujto t'a stojolal ix a b'o yaj smasanil.
Ek'anhec oyoyoc t'a spatic yichanh Sion, tze b'isani jaye' storreal.
Scham wal he sayan eyil smuroal. Schampax eyilan spat heb' yajal, yic wach' ol yal eyalanel yab'ixal t'a heb' unin manto aljoclaj.
Ha sDiosal Sion, aton ko Diosal t'a junelnhej. Ha tzonh ik'annhej b'eyoc masanto t'a slajwub'.
